review: (Translated by Google) The stadium has been recently renovated and uses synthetic grass on the surface of the field. Single seat seats in the western stands are still too tight in my opinion. Then the supporting pillars also block the view towards the field. Many people want a stadium without a running track, but I am not comfortable watching a match in a stadium without a running track because players who run on the sides of the field are not clearly visible due to obstruction of the guardrail. But as much appreciation to the city government of Semarang and Central Java as they have tried to improve the facilities in this Citarum stadium.
